text: Arosa is a municipality and a ski resort in the district of Plessur in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013 the former municipalities of Calfreisen, Castiel, Langwies, Lüen, Molinis, Peist and St. Peter-Pagig merged into the municipality of Arosa. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Arosa Category:Municipalities in Plessur Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland
title: Arosa
